$HP umpire Tony Randazzo was hit multiple times by Ivan Nova pitches that bounced; one struck him on the chin and he was treated by Yankees trainers; after the game, Randazzo was taken to the hospital for x-rays and further treatment2011ALD2.EVE.post.comment.csv"

replay,5,canor001,NYA,davig901,NYC21,O,N,I,,H $Robinson Cano's fly to LF hit the top of the wall and caromed back onto the field; it was ruled in play but when the Yankees asked about the call, crew chief Gerry Davis watched the replay and upheld the call; this was the fourth usage in post-season2011ALD2.EVE.post.comment.csv"
